timeline.bodyText: Is a wait needed before fetching slow request warnings?
timeline.author: fmhwong

replies.bodyText: @fmhwong Yeah, its needed, since the test case might automatically fail, even before the slow request warnings are logged. I noticed in some SOE platforms, the test case executes faster, even before messages are logged. So, its better waiting for the message to appear.
replies.author: pgunapal

replies.bodyText: I meant you have server.waitForStringInLogUsingMark("TRAS0112W", 10000) in other cases but not here.  The question was "do you need one here"?
replies.author: fmhwong

replies.bodyText: Oh okay, no we don't need one here, since the server.waitForStringInLogUsingMark("TRAS0112W", 10000) is in the fetchNoOfslowRequestWarnings() method already for this class.
replies.author: pgunapal
